title: 115. Jealousy, Comparison, & Codependency
itunes:title: Jealousy, Comparison, & Codependency
description:
In this episode of The Self Love Fix Podcast, I’m talking about how jealousy and comparison relate to codependency. I’ll also break down the steps on how to stop comparing yourself to others and how to finally overcome the jealousy!

Here are a few points I cover: 

  • The core feelings that we are trying to experience
  • What to focus on when it comes to overcoming jealousy
  • How to partner with jealousy and look for abundance

These feelings of jealousy, comparison, and anxiousness come from the idea that you’re doing something wrong. You're not doing anything wrong. You're exactly where you're supposed to be and you're doing exactly what you should be doing. Remember, you are on your path. There’s no race. You bloom when it’s time.

If you liked this episode of the podcast, take a screenshot, head on over to my Instagram and share it on your IG stories and tag me, @theselflovefix

If you love what you learned, be sure to hit that follow button so you never miss a future episode, and make sure to leave a review to help me reach more listeners just like you looking to follow their inner truth and live a life of abundance & authentic self-love.

 

CONNECT WITH BEATRICE:

Instagram

Website

 

EPISODE RESOURCES:

Use code “bizbirthday20” at checkout to save 20% off my e-books, e-courses, workshops, and more over at beatricekamau.com/programs
